synopsis.text: Trip to a picturesque lakeside cottage awaits Kohei Hasekura, a second-year transfer student at the prestigious Shuchikan Academy, after the school festival. As he and his fellow student council members take a break from their hard work, Kohei finds himself surrounded by an unexpected group of classmates - vampires hiding in plain sight within the academy. Amidst the serene countryside, Kohei becomes the center of attention for the female students, leading to an unforgettable vacation filled with laughter, camaraderie, and perhaps a hint of romance. Join Kohei and his friends as they navigate the unique challenges of attending a school where humans and vampires coexist in this thrilling and heartwarming anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
